    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/organization/v3

    Facet Facility_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/organization/v3:Facility_ID
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/organization/v3:Facility_Summary

    • Example XML
